product.name: Auralo BackLuxe Hoodie
product.unique_feature: Sparkle rhinestone mesh V-panel on back

pain_points.pain: Boring, basic hoodies that look like everyone else's
pain_points.language: I'm so tired of looking basic in my hoodie

pain_points.pain: Can't find athleisure that's both comfy AND stylish
pain_points.language: Why do I have to choose between comfort and looking cute?

pain_points.pain: Want to stand out but not be over-the-top
pain_points.language: I want subtle glam, not disco ball energy

pain_points.pain: Tired of cheap quality that falls apart after washing
pain_points.language: Spent $50 on a hoodie and it looked trashed after 2 washes

pain_points.pain: Nothing transitions well from gym to brunch to errands
pain_points.language: I need something I can wear literally everywhere

desires.desire: Feel confident and stylish without trying too hard
desires.language: I just want to look effortlessly put together

desires.desire: Get compliments and attention on their style
desires.language: Where did you get that?! is my favorite thing to hear

desires.desire: Own unique pieces nobody else has
desires.language: I hate seeing someone wearing the same thing as me

desires.desire: Versatile wardrobe staple that works for multiple occasions
desires.language: One piece, endless outfits - that's the dream

desires.desire: Premium quality that lasts and feels luxurious
desires.language: I'd rather pay more for something that actually lasts

phrases: Low-key extra and I'm here for it
The sparkle without being too much

objections.response: It's subtle sparkle - catches light beautifully without being over the top

objections.objection: Will it hold up in the wash?
objections.response: Premium construction - wash inside out, cold water, air dry. Built to last.
The mesh panel is decorative - it's not fully open, so you're covered

objections.objection: Can I actually wear this to the gym?
objections.response: 100% - breathable mesh keeps you cool during workouts
Oversized fit - size down for fitted, true to size for comfy oversized

faq_questions.question: Is the rhinestone mesh see-through?
faq_questions.answer: Not at all! The mesh panel is decorative with rhinestone embellishments - it catches light beautifully but you're fully covered. It's all about the sparkle, not the show.

faq_questions.question: Will the rhinestones fall off after washing?
faq_questions.answer: Our rhinestones are heat-bonded for durability. Just wash inside out, cold water, and air dry - your sparkle will stay intact wash after wash.

faq_questions.question: What's the fit like? Should I size up or down?
faq_questions.answer: It's an intentionally oversized, relaxed fit. For a true oversized look, go with your normal size. For a more fitted look, size down one. See our size chart for exact measurements.

faq_questions.question: Can I wear this to the gym AND out?
faq_questions.answer: That's exactly what it's designed for! The breathable mesh back keeps you cool during workouts, while the stylish design means you can go straight from gym to coffee to dinner without changing.

faq_questions.question: How long does shipping take?
faq_questions.answer: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, and express shipping takes 2-3 business days. You'll receive tracking info via email.

copy_direction.headline: THE ORIGINAL BACKLUXE HOODIE - SPARKLE WITHOUT THE BASIC
copy_direction.subheadline: Premium rhinestone mesh back that turns heads without trying too hard
copy_direction.comparison_old: Basic boring hoodies that blend in
copy_direction.comparison_new: Statement piece that gets compliments everywhere
copy_direction.guarantee: 30-Day Style Guarantee - If you don't get at least 5 compliments, we'll refund you. No questions asked.
